object.name: createNewStickerSet
object.description: Use this method to create a new sticker set owned by a user. The bot will be able to edit the sticker set thus created. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to create a new sticker set owned by a user. The bot will be able to edit the sticker set thus created. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to create a new sticker set owned by a user. The bot will be able to edit the sticker set thus created. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: User identifier of created sticker set owner
annotations.html_description: User identifier of created sticker set owner
annotations.rst_description: User identifier of created sticker set owner
annotations.name: user_id

annotations.description: Short name of sticker set, to be used in t.me/addstickers/ URLs (e.g., animals). Can contain only English letters, digits and underscores. Must begin with a letter, can't contain consecutive underscores and must end in "_by_<bot_username>". <bot_username> is case insensitive. 1-64 characters.
annotations.html_description: Short name of sticker set, to be used in t.me/addstickers/ URLs (e.g., animals). Can contain only English letters, digits and underscores. Must begin with a letter, can't contain consecutive underscores and must end in "_by_<bot_username>". <bot_username> is case insensitive. 1-64 characters.
annotations.rst_description: Short name of sticker set, to be used in :code:`t.me/addstickers/` URLs (e.g., *animals*). Can contain only English letters, digits and underscores. Must begin with a letter, can't contain consecutive underscores and must end in :code:`"_by_<bot_username>"`. :code:`<bot_username>` is case insensitive. 1-64 characters.
annotations.name: name

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized list of 1-50 initial stickers to be added to the sticker set
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized list of 1-50 initial stickers to be added to the sticker set
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized list of 1-50 initial stickers to be added to the sticker set
annotations.name: stickers

annotations.description: Format of stickers in the set, must be one of 'static', 'animated', 'video'
annotations.html_description: Format of stickers in the set, must be one of “static”, “animated”, “video”
annotations.rst_description: Format of stickers in the set, must be one of 'static', 'animated', 'video'
annotations.name: sticker_format

annotations.description: Type of stickers in the set, pass 'regular', 'mask', or 'custom_emoji'. By default, a regular sticker set is created.
annotations.html_description: Type of stickers in the set, pass “regular”, “mask”, or “custom_emoji”. By default, a regular sticker set is created.
annotations.rst_description: Type of stickers in the set, pass 'regular', 'mask', or 'custom_emoji'. By default, a regular sticker set is created.
annotations.name: sticker_type

annotations.description: Pass True if stickers in the sticker set must be repainted to the color of text when used in messages, the accent color if used as emoji status, white on chat photos, or another appropriate color based on context; for custom emoji sticker sets only
annotations.html_description: Pass True if stickers in the sticker set must be repainted to the color of text when used in messages, the accent color if used as emoji status, white on chat photos, or another appropriate color based on context; for custom emoji sticker sets only
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if stickers in the sticker set must be repainted to the color of text when used in messages, the accent color if used as emoji status, white on chat photos, or another appropriate color based on context; for custom emoji sticker sets only
annotations.name: needs_repainting
